name: j v
text: The pizza was freshly made, not reheated pizza. Friendly staff, nice place over all. Highly recommend this place

name: Lindsay Lee
text: Pizza was cooked to PERFECTION. Thanks for the best stuffed crust I've had in a while!! Your other locations should emulate this crust   🤤🤤 pineapple was a little dry but we managed.

name: Bob Jones
text: Had a great carryout contactless experience here since their dine in is closed. Manager informed me that buffet was being removed. Sucks but hey. They still make a great stuffed crust. Pretty sure all buffets in the entire Orlando area have been shut down since Spring...

name: Gregory Eisenberg
text: I wanted to give this less stars, but the staff was deserving of more. Pizza was extremely greasy -- like wet on the bottom from the amount of grease. With that being said, there was one woman handling the entire restaurant, and her service …More

name: Ashley Gounder
text: Vents are full of mold. MGMT just paints over it! Great service for lunch buffet as always (love the two regular waitresses) just wish they would clean the mold the right way!

name: lisette ruch
text: Hands down the best pizza in the city!  We always get more pizza than we can possibly eat, so we can have left overs for breakfast the next day.

name: SandK Dearing
text: Man, this place is as old as the hills but I love it.  Excellent food served hot plus friendly service. I don't like that yoy have to request a key for the restroom but, given the location I understand the necessity. Weekday pizza buffet is so good!

name: L McFarland
text: For $5.99 plus tax, you get all the pizza you can eat, bread sticks, cinnamon sticks and pasta you can eat. My son and I enjoyed our meal. They even made my fav BBQ beef! Monday-Friday it ends at 2pm.

name: Vincent Mullins
text: I would give them 4 stars but the consistency of the pizza is an issue.

name: Christina
text: We dined in at this Pizza Hut after seeing a theater show. Anthony was wonderful. He was so attentive and friendly. we chose to order a dinner box and a salad. Our pizza came out hot and fresh, and the breadsticks were yummy. The cinnamon …More

text: Stopped by to have one of my favorite pizzas. This is still one of the best pizzas around this area. Great atmosphere and excellent customer service.

name: Allen Buford
text: The buffet here is worth coming here. It's only available during lunch hours but its only 4.99 plus a drink. Best value you will find anywhere, better than Cici's. The staff is friendly and helpful. Only complaint is the seating. It can get pretty busy for the lunch buffet, so wish it was larger.

name: John Rushe
text: Had dinner here and Cathy waited on us. She was great! Such a nice, warm, and funny lady. Thanks Cathy!!!

name: Michelle Puleo
text: The lunch buffet is a fantastic value. The staff is awesome at staying on top of fresh pies coming out. The waitstaff makes sure your drinks are topped off and that you're enjoying the lunch! Overall, definitely check this location out. It's clean and the food is great for fast-food pizza!

name: Robert Stuller
text: Its good. Staff is really friendly. Good food. Only issue is when it gets busy they seem to need more hands.
